dotnetType.name: NullableResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Nullable`1" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new nullable resolver case.
The resolver instance to use to resolve underlying types.

returns.summary:
If the type is <see cref="T:System.Nullable`1" />, a successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" />
            for its underlying type; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result
            otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullableResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
